item.description:
Optimum Health Solution presents...

Ask Dr. T

Join us for an insightful, informal evening with Dr. Adiel Tel-Oren to answer your questions!

Come at 6 pm for delicious smoothies and snacks

Donate vegan organic snacks (finger-food) and only pay an entrance fee of $13.00 e.g. sushi, portabello mushrooms, burritos, raw crackers, bars, cookies etc.

All proceeds to benefit Nepalese and our inner city children!

To participate, you may e-mail your questions early or ask them when you get there. If you e-mail to betsy.bragg6@gmail.com, you will get in line and Dr. T will answer in the order received.

People who donate to the snack sale will have priority.

Questions received so far:

What are the best foods to enhance memory? -Tom Lindsley
For mood disorders and brain physiology, are there any safe remedies that would be benevolent for pretty much everybody? - Marty Cohen
Would you give specific information about your on-line course for a B.S. degree in functional medicine? What is the link for registration? How much will the entire degree cost and what is the cost per course? What is the course requirement for the degree? -Jim McIver
What are the guidelines and examples of an optimal daily meal plan for breakfast, lunch, and dinner? - Howard Wagner and Sheryl Stone
When foraging, which plants provide the most calories and are the most nutrient dense? - Curtis Griffing

Please send you questions! This promises to be a very interesting evening!


Free Parking: Across the street from the church at the McDevitt School. Please do not park in principal's space.


Pay online at "events" at http://doctortevents.com or pay cash or check at door.

Cost: $18, or only $13 if you donate to the snack sale

Proceeds to benefit:

The Everest Learning Academy (ELA) established by Dr. T in Nepal's Ghorka District. Click here to learn more about the Nepal programs of Dr. T. Also watch this 3 minute video: https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=3158071793247

Optimum Health Solution's Somerville Afterschool Program. www.realkidsrealfood.org

 

Event Schedule on Thursday, July 26th, 2012:

6-7pm          Registration and organic food sale with proceeds to charities

7-8:30pm     Information session hosted by Dr. Adiel Tel-Oren

8:30-11pm   FREE brief skin inspections and skin clinic appointments


Dr. T., MD DC LN CCN DABFN FABDA, is a sought after holistic scientist who educates medical professionals and the general public about functional medicine and disease prevention via truly natural lifestyle and dietary modification. He is a licensed European Medical Doctor, Licensed Nutritionist and is American Board Certified of Functional Medicine, of Oxidative Medicine and of Chelation Therapy. He is the founder of several holistic non-profits in US and Nepal, Asia, Africa & Europe.
item.name: Have questions about raw food/vegan lifestyle and skin problems? Ask Dr.T!
